name: Moon Digger
description:
Well congratulations, you are on the moon now...
You have to find ores  and bring them back to your base in order to complete it and be safe at last. You can carry only up to 10 ores.

Beware of these guys :

   can walk SLOW and dig FAST / cannot go upward

 can fly FAST / cannot dig

 can fly and follow you  everywhere / moves very SLOW

Controls :

WASD or NUMPAD or ARROW KEY :  Move / Jump / Jetpack / Dig 

Made for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam #5 - 2023 - Optionnal theme : FAST & SLOW
